Posts.Content: Luvresia wrote: I had an abscess on my back it opened up so I went to the ER directly from work. They performed a ct to see how big my infection was. The ct was to be of the abdomen and pelvis but for some unknown reason he also did my chest. They found a mass in my left breast and said i needed a biopsy.I was admitted to the hospital for my abscess. A week later I had a mammogram and ultrasound. The mass in my left breast was a cyst, but there is a mass in the right one. It has a starburst shape is 1.6 cm solid deep behind the nipple. Auxillary lymph nodes on both sides enlarged. Have biopsy scheduled for next week. Im freaking out I cant sleep. Trying to stay positive. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Waiting for biopsy... Luvresia Luvresia

Posts.Content: Dec 10, 2014 09:25PM Luvresia wrote: Thank you, I try to stay informed knowledge is power but in this case knowledge leads to anxiety. Its nice to have somewhere to vent and talk with women who understand my point of view.
Posts.Title: Waiting for biopsy... Luvresia Luvresia
